Air Jordan 3 Retro Wolf Grey Wolf Grey/Metallic Silver-Black-White 136064-004Wolf Grey leather handles the upper of this pair, while metallic silver elephant print adds flair to the toebox, mid-lace panel and heel. Silver also fills Jumpman branding on the tongue and heel and helps complete the look on the outsole.
